Subject: Fully funded PhD about evolutionary computation, robotics, and machine learning
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=517809752
From: Jean-Baptiste Mouret <jeanbaptiste.mouret@...>

Dear all,

We have funding for a PhD student for a topic that may interest =
some of you. The position is at Inria Nancy (East of France).

The selected=
 PhD student will work in the ERC project ResiBots (funded by the European =
Research Commission). The overall goal of the project is to develop novel l=
earning algorithms that make it possible for autonomous robots to quickly d=
iscover compensatory behaviors when they are damaged (e.g. a broken motor) =
or when they encounter an unforeseen situation. 

The technique that we wil=
l use is based on MAP-Elites (an evolutionary algorithm), Bayesian optimiza=
tion (a model-based optimization algorithm), and possibly some neuro-evolut=
ion.

Demonstration: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Dp6oegqDrCDs
See also=
: http://pages.isir.upmc.fr/~mouret

The deadline for application is the fi=
rst of June!

Details and application form: http://t.co/d4q3bJOnL8

Best re=
gards,
=97 Jean-Baptiste Mouret
http://pages.isir.upmc.fr/~mouret/
